item.title: May 2010 - God: new evidence
item.itunes:subtitle: David Couchman and John Ayrton discuss God: new evidence - the new apologetics resource from Focus featuring John Polkinghorne, David Wilkinson, Rodney Holder, Peter Williams and Graham Swinerd - cosmic fine-tuning that points towards a creator.
item.itunes:author: David Couchman
item.author: dcouchman@focus.org.uk
item.itunes:summary: David Couchman and John Ayrton discuss God: new evidence - the new apologetics resource from Focus featuring John Polkinghorne, David Wilkinson, Rodney Holder, Peter Williams and Graham Swinerd talking about the cosmic fine-tuning that points towards a creator, for the Seize the Day podcast in May 2010.
